It hurts that they would take things like this away. I had been hoping that when money wasn‚Äôt so tight I‚Äôd be able to get a paid membership, but I don‚Äôt know if I can trust them right now and feel they aren‚Äôt really trying to help people become less stressed and more mindful if they are practically forcing people to start paying to use their app when there is so much negative stuff still hanging around.
title: Feeling Hurt

review: I have used the Calm app daily for 6 years. I love doing the 3 Dailys every morning first thing, getting life advice from 3 great teachers of mindfulness and meditation. The app is well organized and maintained, the content is extensive yet manageable, and it is easy to navigate and not overwhelming. It sets me on my course every morning, understanding, accepting, and loving the beautiful symphony of the body, mind, heart, and consciousness. It has taught me that life is as complicated as you make it, and as easy as you let it.
title: Calm is the best meditation app

review: Calm app has given me a safe haven to allow my past pains to flow through me. My clenched body can release pinned up emotions. I remember crying as a kid and being told ‚ÄúI have to be strong‚Äù imagine, a 10 year being told to be strong and stop crying after being touched to soon. Black girls aren‚Äôt allowed to express our emotions but this app has opened me up to information and resources unimaginable. Breathing exercises, sleep stories and guided meditation. I‚Äôm blessed to have found an app that truly has kept me CALM.
title: Keeping Calm

review: If I could give zero stars, that is exactly what this app deserves. I NEVER used the app and when I saw that I was charged for it, I tried corresponding with them SEVERAL times immediately, to no avail of a simple response, let alone the refund for $35 I desperately need at this time of year. If they would look, they would see I NEVER used their services past the first day I received the free trial. Even then, I was on the app for ~5 minutes before I closed it out, forgot about it with everything else going on, and never opened it back up. They got me to sign up stating they were helping people during the pandemic‚Ä¶this is NOT helping; only hurting this single mother while we‚Äôre still experiencing Covid-19 effects!
title: DO NOT accept ‚Äúfree‚Äù trial

review:
As an educator, I‚Äôve been using Calm for years to help my students unwind after standardized testing and to help me fall asleep. I love this app. I have favorite narrators, and if I have a hard time falling asleep, I know if I put on anything by Bhav, Alan, or Eric, I‚Äôll be asleep in minutes. 

HOWEVER

This newest update has made Calm stay on the opening screen, and not move beyond ‚Äútake a deep breath.‚Äù I can‚Äôt get to the sleep stories! And having gone through an interstate move and starting a new job in the past two weeks, my stress is at an all time high. Please, Calm, fix your app! Thank you!
title: I just wish they‚Äôd patch it!

review:
I love this app one of my friends recommend it to me and I have used it since. One I got it I payed and latter realized that, you can use it on so many divis√©s with out having to pay as long as it‚Äôs on the same Apple scout and I love that. 
It bin very helpful with my sleep.
I use the sleep story‚Äôs and the sounds the most.I don‚Äôt really get why people are like why do you have to pay blabla of course you have to pay and it‚Äôs for a good reason. 100%would recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
title: I love it 100 % recommended ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

review:
I deal with extreme depression and anxiety but can‚Äôt afford to take the medical treatment road due to hardships so I wanted to try this app that claimed to be free in it‚Äôs promotions across various platforms and what they posted on the form of media I was on, worked decently. The only free thing about this is the download and 2 irrelevant ‚Äúpodcast‚Äù type of speeches. I was bummed when I found out they offered their services for something along the lines of 10/month. It isn‚Äôt crazy expensive but if I could afford that, then I‚Äôd just save a bit of money to go to my doctor and ask for a prescription. 
Guess we live in a time where no one helps anyone without trying to get something out of it. I do not recommend.
title: Waste of time

review: Calm helps me stay centered. I have learned to let emotions go and not get caught up in thoughts. Recently I was getting angry and developing rage with waiting for a customer service agent to answer the phone to address an issue I thought I had resolved the previous week. I was able to recognize and dismiss this inappropriate response and not get caught up in angry thoughts. By the time the agent answered, I had calmed down and could focus on resolving the issue. I think using Calm for a year taught me to do that. Thank you.
title: Centered

review: So I love the sleep stories. I think most people agree one persons relaxing voice can be grating to another. I don‚Äôt understand except from a guess that she started the app why the meditation section is totally dominated by one person in particular. And I‚Äôm sure there might be many that find her voice nice but personally I would like variety and am disappointed I pay for calm and while the sleep stories keep having a wide range of readers , for those of us who want to meditate it‚Äôs always the same person. Please expand on options. Especially in light if nothing else or cultural diversity etc
title: Same voice for almost all meditations?

review: I‚Äôm incredibly glad that I downloaded this app! I am a still suffering mental health patient who lives at home as a caretaker for my elderly father and who can no longer work due to the nature of my Anxiety and Depression disorders. I had given up on the idea that I was ever going to be able to be completely at personal peace again. Thanks to this app though I now have confidence that I can not only get back to that place but I can get back to it EVERY DAY NOW!!!
title: One of the best things I‚Äôve ever downloaded!

review: I tried this app on a trial and liked it so much I wanted to purchase it but the price tag impeded me. I couldn't imagine spending so much on an app but, on the other hand, I also couldn't stop missing the sleep stories. They offer a range of excellent material (meditations, lectures, sleep sounds), but I love to fall asleep to stories.  I waited for another special, bit the bullet, and bought the LIFETIME membership. I am happy to share that I use this app regularly and am sleeping like a baby:)

I don‚Äôt like flying.  My first take off made me a bundle of nerves and I didn‚Äôt know how I would do it again.  I remembered my app to see if I had anything that would help and I listened to the calming flying anxiety meditation 3 times while waiting to take off.  It made a HUGE difference. It helped so so much.
title: Worth the price of a membership

review:
I‚Äôve had the calm app for a few years now. I love the sleep stories and have told many about them. However, in the past 2 months this app has been buggy beyond usable. I‚Äôve had to uninstall and reinstall more than once, which is not what you want to deal with when you‚Äôre trying to wind down and sleep for the evening. The two main issues I‚Äôve had are the app just not loading (staying on ‚Äútake a deep breath‚Äù screen) or the scenes not playing in the background, which I use for white noise as I live in an urban area. 

Hope these bugs get fixed soon and permanently!!
title: Would be great if it worked consistently

review: The Calm app has truly transformed my daily routine. It‚Äôs my go-to for finding peace and relaxation amidst life‚Äôs chaos. The guided meditations and sleep stories are a game-changer for my sleep quality. The soothing sounds and beautiful visuals transport me to a serene place whenever I need it. I appreciate the variety of content, from mindfulness exercises to stress relief techniques. Calm has become an essential part of my self-care journey, and I couldn‚Äôt recommend it more highly. Thank you for creating this oasis of tranquility in my busy life!
title: HENRY CHOLAKYAN

review: I love this app. I have used it the entire year that I‚Äôve had it. I sometimes have trouble falling asleep so I put on the Deep Sleep and I‚Äôve never heard it to the end!  I also use the anxiety meditation. I have lost my brother, sister and my  nephew ( who was 34)  all within 2 years. This app has helped me through trauma. I know that it‚Äôs $70 dollars but it is so worth it. My renewal is in August and I‚Äôm definitely going to buy it again. You won‚Äôt be disappointed. üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü
title: Has  helped me tremendously. üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

review: started working from home full time 5 years ago. realizing i needed breaks, got this app. love it. love so many new features like sleep stories, naps, motion. when my BFF learned her hubby had stage 4 and had months to live, i gave her a subscription. she kept it long after and now her daughter uses it too. people have no idea how a simple 10 min/day can ground you from the craziness. i was always a bit of a flower child, so i guess it makes sense i found it. üå∑üå∑üå∑
title: staying balanced and sane.

review:
I apologize for the dissertation but I needed to share...
I‚Äôve slowly wandered away from my Daily Calm sessions over the last 18 months or so.  When I read the daily inspiration this morning I decided to invest the 10 minutes.   All I can say is I‚Äôm grateful I‚Äôm a lifetime member. The universe called me today. I‚Äôve heard and read theories about worry and anxiety a thousand times.  However, this morning‚Äôs Daily Calm on reflecting on your worry and the onset anxiety hit a cord in my sole.  Thank you Tamara and entire Calm Team!
title: Time Away

review: Love this app! I have been using it for 2.5 years now and it has helped me to be consistent in my meditation practice. And the additional Spark sessions are interesting and helpful short listening segments and the masterclasses are enlightening as well! Get this app!!
title: Life Changing

I primarily utilize the sleep stories, and play rain at night.. but I‚Äôve also dabbled in daily check ins, master classes, and meditation. This app has saved me from so many anxiety driven nights. I will forever be grateful to this platform. Thank you!!
title: A safe place to land

review: We use this app for every person in our family! I wake up to daily motivational meditations and put my children to bed using the kids sleep stories. I love falling asleep to the sounds of waterfalls or whales or any other dreamy adventure I‚Äôm hoping to find that is inspired by this app. I‚Äôve also found motivation during the day while at work and it‚Äôs helped me overcome challenges by prompting me to shift my mindset. This versatile program is great for all!
title: Use for the entire family!

review:
I downloaded this to try to find a free meditation app. There are so many subscriptions that I was hoping this free version would be decent. It‚Äôs not. In the middle of meditating, and finally getting my body to relax, ADS start playing. Do you know how jarring that is to a nervous system? Listening to calm music and all of sudden loud ads playing! I understand that these apps if free sometimes will have ads.. but geeeeez let people finish listening to a 15 -30 min meditation that you advertise as FREE before playing ads. 
Sad that even something that is supposed to help the mental health of people is trying to first find a way to make money off of you
title: Beware ‚Äúfree‚Äù is full of ads that play while you meditate

review: Anxiety and stress has ruled my life, but what I‚Äôve learned recently is that your view point of these issues matters. If you see anxiety and stress as being detrimental to your health, your body tenses up. This tense state leads to more anxiety, stress, depression, and can lead to sickness. Meditation is holistic in the sense that it helps you be alright with your current state, allowing your body and mind to ease the tension. This app very much helps the mental muscles we need to be content and understand of today‚Äôs challenges.
title: Life changing!

review: This is a great app with great content that will really help you become a better version of yourself if you truly intentional invest. I see so many complaints about a lot of the content not being free but with all the stuff people waste their money on that doesn‚Äôt help better themselves, this is an investment. Great and more than enough free content if that‚Äôs what you prefer but i have the lifetime subscription and it‚Äôs well worth the little over 5$ a month.
title: Great App/Invest in your wellness

review:
I just re-checked this app after a couple years away, and there are some amazing updates that I absolutely love. 

However unfortunately 95% of the meditations are STILL only one person Tamara, who has a grating voice with an affected ‚Äúvocal fry‚Äú. I don‚Äôt understand why the app still doesn‚Äôt offer various different voices, they say she is their ‚Äúhead of mindfulness‚Äú but her a voice is like nails on a chalkboard.

Only 3 meditations have a male alternative Jeff and his voice is great, very listenable and soothing, but this isn‚Äôt enough content to make me pay. 

I‚Äôm also surprised that I still can‚Äôt search by length of meditation, for example today I want to do a 20 minute meditation and there‚Äôs no way to search for that. 
 
Really disappointed as (unlike many whining angry reviewers) I am ready and happy to pay $70 for a meditation app, and I wish it could be this one. I think having one person do all of the meditation is a mistake. Offer more options. We‚Äôre not all going to be able to stand listening to a weirdly affected way of speaking.
title: Can‚Äôt stand the voice

review: I have the free app, an older version and I absolutely love the scenes option. There are a few that I use for meditation. However, on my newest device, I have downloaded calm in order to access scenes. Sadly, it is no longer an option. :( The 7 day meditation is also no longer free. Bummer. I have considered purchasing the yearly however, without the scenes, I cannot. I honestly don‚Äôt need rain sounds. I love the grounding sounds with the scenes option... still a great app for some people. I refuse to use the latest version as it no longer contains scenes.
title: Bring back ‚ÄúScenes‚Äù with the newer version!

review: This application has really helped me think deep into my thoughts and what career and lifestyle is better for me, I‚Äôm working towards that progress to become a ‚ÄúFilm Director.‚Äù I‚Äôve never honestly thought I would actually find my career pathway that would fascinate me so much threw an amazing application; I‚Äôm done being a mess up and a non-graduate student I found something that interested me since I was a kid. Wish me luck on my new career pathway maybe someday I‚Äôll direct one of your favorite movies!!üòä
title: ~My Career pathway~

review: I‚Äôve been using this app for almost 7 years. It was great to start my meditation journey, and really helped with depression and anxiety. For me I think it just got too into fads and ‚Äúin‚Äù pseudo therapists and focused on commodification of certain aspects of the app. Stick with what your good at, people come for the interesting variety of sessions not just because a self help guru is attached to it, at least I don‚Äôt. Also I was a big fan of the daily meditation (daily calm) but turned off when they just kept repeating at a certain point, I find it hard to believe you couldn‚Äôt actually create new meditations for daily use.
title: Loved this app until I didn‚Äôt

review: I love the calm app it helps me fall asleep so easily before the calm app I was constantly waking up in the middle of the night and couldn‚Äôt sleep but now with just a few minutes with the calm app medallion on I fall right to sleep! title: So amazing

review: From help falling asleep, soothing anxiety, finding peace, to prioritizing gratitude, the Calm app covers so many bases and helps build a foundation of improved mental health and wellness‚Ä¶something for the whole family.  Highly recommend!  The categories prompt you to address areas that you may not otherwise think to focus in on- but once you do, with consistency, you develop the tools for resilience, better coping, and the ability to find joy and light in your day.
title: Meets so many needs

review: So I love this app an am considering buying a premium membership BUT it has a seriously annoying problem. Even when the app is completely closed it will start playing when I either plug my phone into the car stereo or when I used my AirPods. This is seriously annoying because there‚Äôs no way to shut it off when the app isn‚Äôt even open. It even overrides the music. You then you have to reopen the app and shut it again to get it to stop! Please fix this. This app should not work when it‚Äôs completely closed.
title: Great but has an annoying bug

review: I‚Äôm a life long night owl who has trouble winding down to sleep . Calm app helps with that . After having been a paying subscriber for a year and a half , I can recommend this app , it does what it advertises. It helps me go to sleep. My grandchildren listen to the sleep stories when they are at my house. I love the variety of stories and narrators and music. Look forward to seeing the new stories that are added each week.  Didn‚Äôt give 5 stars because I would like some sleep stories narrated by Fox News hosts.
title: Well Worth It

review: This app has been a tremendous help for my anxiety. I struggle with anxiety on an almost daily basis, along with semi-frequent panic attacks. I have been using the Calm app to meditate daily. There are several series on managing stress and anxiety. I started off with the free version and then quickly purchased the full version. My husband and I enjoy listening to the soundscapes at night as well. The price seems steep, but if you break it down to what it would be per month, it‚Äôs not bad at all. I couldn‚Äôt be happier with this app. Thank you, Calm!
title: Miracle App

review: I use this app every night for meditation. It‚Äôs very useful, but there is one thing holding it back a bit. A few of the scenes that you can play in the background are less than 15 minutes long. Usually, that wouldn‚Äôt be a problem, but the shortest time you can play the sounds out of the app is 15 minutes. This creates a very obvious and distracting fade out that loops back to the beginning and breaks concentration. Otherwise, I highly recommend the app even for the limited free content.
title: Great Free Version With Only One Flaw

review: I‚Äôm an assistant principal, so one can imagine that there are many things coming at me. The Calm App has so many great resources that help me manage all of the challenges that come with the role, especially the Daily Calm. It‚Äôs time for me just to be every morning before I leave for work. And I‚Äôve learned quotations and bits of wisdom that have helped me frame my thinking. I received some feedback on a particularly hectic day, ‚ÄúHow are you so chill?‚Äù I responded that the Calm App plays a big role. Thanks, Calm App Team!
title: Great App!

review: Love this app but I got a scare when I got a new phone. There‚Äôs an assortment of free soundscapes that I‚Äôve been using for years, but when I opened it for the first time on my new phone everything was gone. I tried searching for my soundscapes under the ‚Äúdiscover‚Äù tab and it told me everything was a premium feature. I was super mad that stuff I had for free for years was suddenly gone! Then I clicked the little mountains icon in the top left and found my stuff for free. Weird that they say free stuff is behind a paywall when you try to use the üîésearch tab‚Ä¶
title: Love this app but I got a scare

review: I used to use Calm many years ago when it was not nearly as well known as it is now. I also paid for a year of premium back in the day, which I think at the time was only $40. I‚Äôve been having trouble sleeping lately and so I redownloaded the app but wow. I could barely find one meditation as a free user. At this point, it shouldn‚Äôt even be called Calm premium, it should just be called Calm because it‚Äôs really hard to say that this app really exists at all for free users. I appreciate that the company needs to grow itself and subscriptions are a great model for that but let users get some use out of the app before you ask them to spend $70 on an annual subscription.
title: Nothing for Free Users

review: I started off with calm on my Apple Watch, with limited options, but they are good options. Then I decided to get Calm on my phone. As for someone with really bad anxiety and stress, this is an app that just having helps. But there is very few, and I mean very few, options that are not locked that I have found so far. I would love to try the daily calm, but in-app purchases  are blocked on my device. So there are very limited options for me. I have only found 3 options so far. However, I love the background noise and I love that there are no adds.
title: Very limited options

review: Got this app free as a company benefit. I don‚Äôt care about all the new age meditation stuff and 99% of the content but really enjoy a couple of the sleep soundtracks- right up to the point of a large volume increase in the middle of the night waking me up. Exhausted again, I‚Äôll find a decent sound machine app. Keep the volume level, and I would have loved sleeping to the sound of the forrest. All the water apps sound like white noise anyway, even on iPhone 13 (it isn‚Äôt my speaker or Wi-Fi) WTH have big volume increases in the middle of the night??? That defeats the purpose of something that is supposed to help you SLEEP. Now I‚Äôm NOT calm- I‚Äôm starting my day irritated and exhausted.
title: Horrible sleep app for 1 reason- volume fluntuation

review: I love the daily check-in especially since it allows you to let all of your emotions flow freely and it's private so only you can see it. I like the emojis that can represent moods, but please add more like "Passionate", "Powerful", and "Scared". The stories are mostly premium, but you can get by with what you have alone! Please add the daily check-in to ads because I think people will want to let their emotions free by writing down what they  think. Thank you! 100% recommend!
title: Excellent!

title: Enough Tamara already!

review: The sleep stories are amazing! The readers and the stories put my right to sleep. But the main reason for my rating is that I expect when I tap on something it should actually do something. For example when the session rating pops up at the end of a story I cannot rate, close the rating pop up or even close the story. I have to close the app and reopen to continue using the app. Also I cannot turn off the background sounds when the app is open. I‚Äôm sure some folks like the clam sounds that play when navigating around the app but it‚Äôs kinda a distraction from getting to what I want and there is no option to turn it off.
title: Content is amazing, app is slow or not responsive

review: I took the first opportunity when there was a discounted offer, to purchase a lifetime subscription. This app has literally kept me afloat during this pandemic. I have suffered from chronic insomnia and anxiety and my mental health has benefited SO much from the check-in meditations and body scans, especially at bedtime. The sleep stories are great. I fall asleep every single night to softly falling rain and Tamara reminding me to focus on my breath and not my worries. This app has really been a lifesaver for me. Tamara is a national treasure!
title: Lifetime Member

review: The application design is good. The app works nearly flawlessly. However the service is expensive, and most of the content is blah at best, such as a person in a soothing voice telling you how to relieve anxiety with suggestions you could get from a google search. Some of the content is good, such as the music selection but overall you could probably do better elsewhere. I joined through a special offer through my AmEx card. I cancelled the 1/2 price auto renewal since I find I am not using it anywhere near enough to justify the expense.
title: Technically outstanding.  Content is meh.

review: I‚Äôve been using this app forever and it‚Äôs honestly a game changer, those nights I find it hard to relax I go on the app and do their breathing exercises for it and I‚Äôm practically falling asleep doing it. One thing that‚Äôs extremely helpful to me that I use almost every night is the sleep noises, I set the scene to whatever I‚Äôm feeling but normally it‚Äôs any of the rain ones and I set the off app timer and I‚Äôm sleeping in no time. Honestly idk what I‚Äôd do without this app.

review: With anxiety disorder, PNES, sleeping disorder, and epilepsy, I need to take time out of my day to remove the stress and calm the anxiety. This helps with that. The soundscapes and meditation to relax before bedtime is showing improvement in my quality of sleep. I recommend it to everyone because we all need a little self care and relaxation.

review: The marginal cost of providing a digital app to a new user is low, especially given how large the user base is. title: What‚Äôs the profit margin on this thing??

I just don‚Äôt appreciate a sleep app slipping it in behind the parents‚Äô back.
title: Kids Sleep Stories Sneak in LGBTQ+ Content

review: If you like sleeping soundly this is the perfect app for you this is helped me with my anxiety and depression and for all of the stress I feel and it helps me fall sleep at night and you can write reviews on stories and ask them to do more things that you like or maybe stealing them to stop doing stuff that you don‚Äôt like and if you need a calming app that is for therapy or something that can help this is the app for you I know it cost money but it‚Äôs worth it!!
title: The best

review:
I hope I can explain this well. And hoping someone out there has a suggestion. 
I‚Äôve been using Calm off and on for a month now. I paid for the yearly subscription. I believe it can help me learn to meditate better, center myself and fall asleep faster. 
However; when I do the daily meditations with Tara , there are long periods of her not talking and just water running in the background. But then she starts talking again and I am so startled, that it takes a while to get my heart to stop racing. I actually just end up turning off the app at that point.  Not good for anxiety. 
I have had the same issue with the sleep stories. I am falling asleep or dozing off and the voice will scare me back awake. I think some of its due to headphone and the noise/voices being right in my ear. 
Does this happen to anyone else? Have you found success by sticking to a certain theme within the app or a certain narrator? 
Thank you!
title: Startling Me

review: I have had this app for a couple years and I use this app everyday, at least once. There are great meditations to learn, to start my day (with Jay, Tamera, Jeff Warren, and probably others). There are also aids to sleep: sleep stories and sleep meditations (my latest life hack). The content in this app is deeper than wherever I am at. Oh, and also, there is even a portion on body movement (yoga-type) by Mel Mah. Totally worth what I pay. It changes me for the better when I do this.
title: Life Changer

review: I have been using the Calm app for several years and purchased a lifetime membership. It is the best gift I‚Äôve given myself. Rarely a day goes by without doing the Daily Calm, which feels like a good friend. There is so much fantastic content from meditations to movement to sleep stories to music. I use the app several times through the day. It is helping me learn to be more present, navigate emotions, weather difficult situations, and transform old habits.
title: Constant companion

review: This has truly become arguably my favorite app and I cannot express it enough. I never write reviews but in a time that you may need help and don‚Äôt know where to go, I personally feel like I have someone out there who is listening and actively helping my mind get to a better state. Thank you to whoever first decided the app should exist, and to all the creators who‚Äôs work is truly helping people live a better life.
title: Calm really has improved my life.

review: I have been using this app for several years and loved it but in the last few months there have been changes that have brought this app down.   There are way too many children‚Äôs stories that have been added and more than a few excellent adult stories taken away.   More than a few favorites are no longer available.  Also gone is the helpful feature of searching stories by favorite speakers which made finding a favorite quick and easy.   Needless to say, after regularly using this app at night for several years, I will not be renewing.
title: Used to be a great app

review: I‚Äôve battled anxiety & depression for over 30 yrs. I‚Äôve been to doctors, therapists, read books, listened to self help cd‚Äôs, tried several medications and done procedures such as biofeedback. Nothing has calmed me as quickly as this app!!! I heard about it watching Netflix ‚Äúexplained‚Äù series, the episode on mindfulness. I‚Äôve only done 2 sessions and I‚Äôm just amazed how quickly it works! Wonderful!!! My only complaint is it‚Äôs taken me so long to discover!
title: Where has this been all my life?!

review: I love the Harry Styles Dream with me sleepcast. His voice is warm and calming. His story is relaxing and feels like he‚Äôs there for you and with you in a happy and soothing place. Like you‚Äôre strolling peacefully on the shore under the stars holding his hand.  The mention of the stars always being above you is a meditative place you can always go to. The waves on the shore keep you asleep. I have yet to hear the inbetween part since I always fall asleep. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs wonderful.
title: Harry styles dream with me sleepcast review

review: I work in a very busy emergency room and I am now taking care of the mass influx of critically ill patients during the COVID pandemic.  This  has made me so anxious.  I started having trouble sleeping and my stress has lead to an increase in weight.   This app had helped me tremendously!!!  I have learned how to meditate and relax.  The masterclasses are wonderful and I use the music to help me sleep.   Thank you, thank you, thank you.   I plan on renewing my subscription every year!!!!
title: This Has Changed My Outlook

review:
I woke up this morning earlier than usual.  I had recently re-discovered a book that seemed to appear out of nowhere. It‚Äôs called ‚ÄúRediscover Jesus‚Äù.  I began to read it last night, being directed to read 1 chapter a day.
I listened to my Calm this am and then read another chapter.  I feel more relaxed than I normally do .  I usually work up each morning filled with fear and severe depression.  I hope that today is the beginning of something better for me
title: Peace

review:
While I‚Äôm very grateful to have added Calm to my daily routine, for the money, I wish there weren‚Äôt so many repeats.  It‚Äôs one of the more expensive apps and, as I near my third year of membership and if original content is added, then I will definitely cancel.  

I‚Äôm giving it Four Stars, because I do appreciate the Calm it provides, the daily intentions and the quality of content is excellent.
title: Glad I‚Äôve added Calm to my life, but it needs new content

review:
But I can assuredly say that because of this app my life has markedly improved in sleep, motivation, focus, and happiness. Been using for a week. 
I love the utility and variability of the kinds of features for meditating, sleeping, lowering anxiety, etc. The stories are excellent with lovely voices and takes. Cillian Murphy on a train in Ireland. Tamika Brown in an apple orchard. The ability to sleep  the phone while using the app is probably it‚Äôs best feature. 
5 out of 5 (so far)
title: I usually don‚Äôt write reviews

review: I‚Äôve heard many great things about this app and was excited to try it. The one free meditation I tried was great, and when I saw they were offering 60% off the lifetime subscription I decided to go for it. Unfortunately the payment would not process. I talked to my bank who assured me something wasn‚Äôt set up right on Calm‚Äôs end. Calm assured me it was my bank. The app was good, but not so much so that the run around is worth it. App deleted.
title: Unable to process payment

review: I have 12 grandchildren and they love spending the night at Grandma‚Äôs house.  One of the things they like the most is listening to Mr. Calm !  Even the most wound up child finds the story irresistible and none of them have ever heard the end.  Now that I‚Äôm retired, insomnia isn‚Äôt much of a problem for me, but on those rare occasions that I just can‚Äôt sleep, I prefer Mr. Calm to the adult sleep stories if I really need to get to sleep, right now.   His calm, humorous voice is perfect.
title: Mr. Calm is a family favorite!

review:
I love Calm! It is one of my must-have apps, my favorites are the Sleep Stories and I always look forward to the frequent additions to the collection! 

I do wish I am able to access Sleep Stories through my Watch app and/or download certain sleep stories in advance! This is nice for when I don‚Äôt want to wake up from my phone screen or risk getting distracted again. 

Thank you Calm Team!!! Keep up the great work!!!
title: Watch app suggestion

review: I honestly would have never considered anything like this. I love music and tv in the background. Chaos is life. This was provided through my new job for Mental Awareness Month and I though to myself - OK let‚Äôs see what it‚Äôs all about. I am shocked. I am enjoying the abyssal music. It provides volumes of energy to the room. It has helped me with focusing on my tasks for work and it honestly makes time pass expeditiously.
title: Never thought I would like something like this

review: The calm app is amazing. I have stress and insomnia so I can‚Äôt sleep and the calm app is a great way to get me to sleep. As you first go in the app it asks what your feeling and based off of that, it will show you a variety of options to choose from to help that exact emotion. The Calm app also has backgrounds of calm places and some include sound! The only hiccup is that some sleep podcasts keep me awake. What I was looking for is fictional stories that were calming and zen. But otherwise the calm app helps so much in my everyday life!
title: The Calm app

review: I‚Äôm a middle schooler who is trying to balance sports, school, friends, and family. It‚Äôs been tough for me lately and I saw an ad for this app, I thought it would be worth a shot, and right away after only having it for a few week I already notice a difference in the way I play basketball, and my grades. I 100% recommend this for everyone. When you meditate everything goes away.
title: Trying to balance everything

review: I have been using the Calm app for two years now. When my mind starts racing at the beginning of the day, it helps greatly in putting my emotions aside, calming my body and brain, and starting my day off better. I have also learned some fantastic things that have been life changing from the little lessons at the end. It‚Äôs only 10 minutes. And my days go better when I start my day off with Calm.
title: My days go better

review: I have been listening and learning from calm for a year now and I am a better person to myself. So many things were going on in my head and I never knew I could control the thinking as I do now. Each day I learn from the daily calm the techniques that can make my life more healthy. A healthy body is not enough if the mind is just out of control. Thank you to all at calm but especially Tamara and Jeff. Please keep teaching.
title: A better human

review: Supportive, intentional, thoughtful, informational, educational. The only thing I wish I (or creators)could/would take the birds out of the the soundscapes or have a feature where I could mute the birds in the app. There are birds in just about every soundscape to go to sleep to, it‚Äôs limiting to only be able to use a select few. Thank you for your time and dedication in creating such an accessible universal source for humanity. I hope it stays affordable. üôè
title: Favorite Mindful Support App!

review: Currently during me writing this I‚Äôm in the sixth grade. It‚Äôs rough, it‚Äôs not easy, it feels like to you have to be the ‚Äúbig kid‚Äù but calm has made me realize it‚Äôs ok to be childlike and funny at home, but at school if you tune it down but blare it out occasionally then your rays of sunshine will surely cheer everyone! However my favorite metaphor has been as if we were a tree sustaining the earth, when I planet my feet and smile and breath I feel like I am the tree of life!
title: This helped me overcome rough night(s)

review: I've used the Calm app for years for it's meditations and sleep stories. Calm really helped me through some stressful times in my life. I recently discovered the Daily Move and wanted to tell how much I love it. I already have a stretching routine that I do each morning and this has added a little extra variety. I enjoy Mei's sense of humor and appreciate her gentle guidance and soothing tone. Thanks so much for this wonderful addition to an already terrific app.
title: Love the Daily Move!

review: I first was able to try Calm through an employer subscription offered to me as an employee. It was something that took me some time to make a habit and explore, but I am so glad I did. I have since left the company that offered it and am happy to be a paid subscriber for this level of content that is regularly added and updated. Feedback points: would love more courses, music playlists and scrolling area clips.

review: I have been using the Calm app for more than five years. Teaching, masterclasses, music, bedtime sleep stories, and focused meditations have helped me through the years and has become a part of my morning daily ritual. The Daily Trip with Jeff Warren has been a balm in many ways to help me grow through lifes challenges. The app is well organized and it is easy to access all the different choices. Highly recommend this app.
title: Wonderful Meditation Teachers

review: While I recognize that many people undoubtedly like Tamara‚Äôs voice, I find it incredibly annoying and New Age woo woo. I wish there were more male voices available as the app is robust with many great features. I bought a discounted yearly subscription to try to make myself get used to Tamara‚Äôs voice. But, instead, I continue to return to my Balance app where I have multiple choices of voices for ALL the features, not just some. I look forward to the day when I can use all of Calm‚Äôs features without having to listen to Tamara.
title: Really don‚Äôt like Tamara Levitt‚Äôs voice!

review: This was recommended to me because I cannot stay asleep. I sleep on average about 4 hours a night. This claims to be a free app; however, the only thing free are the sounds of crickets and a babbling brook. Nothing else seems to be free. Yes there is a free trial but the hassle of remembering to cancel if I don‚Äôt find anything that works for me in 7 days is irritating.  How are we supposed to get a good sample of the things available in just 7 days? Not enough time and I don‚Äôt want the headache of having to remember to cancel before my card is charged. I‚Äôm cheap, I‚Äôll admit it but a two-week trial would be more appealing.  I will likely be deleting the app as if I wanted to hear crickets, I‚Äôd open a window.
title: Crickets

review:
Hi so I think you should get calm because you probably need it. Especially if you are weird. My favorite story is Michals Sleepy Farm. So you better download this app or I will come to your sleep farm. I will track you down so please get this app because I don‚Äôt want to come to your stinky house. I‚Äôm looking at you bob. Get this app! Thanks for reading this! You probably can‚Äôt. Cause your 7th grade teacher taught you nothing. Bye sweeties!
Sorry I‚Äôm kinda just trolling you. Sorry. :(
title: I love calm!

review: A great and much needed app!  I started using just before the pandemic and it was extremely helpful in getting me through it, and it‚Äôs continuing to help me now. There is something there for just about everyone‚Äôs needs. I just wish the sleep stories had a setting/timer ‚Äúto auto repeat‚Äù just in case I had not yet dozed off to sleep. I have to fully wake up to start the story all over again.  But again a great app!
title: A Much Needed App!!!

review:
Tamara has the perfect voice for the sleep stories and meditations. I have not been disappointed with her work and I‚Äôve been on Calm for about 2 years now!! 
There are many stars in the cast, of course. Mathew McConnaghy comes immediately to mind. Love that guys voice.
I listen to a sleep story every night. It puts me in a wonderful state of relaxation that allows me to forget about the days troubles and drift off. Most nights I don‚Äôt hear the end of the story!!
title: I love Tamara!!

review: I love the Calm app!!!  I am learning so much!  I enjoy the check-ins and all the wisdom I am gaining. I do wish that there were some things that could be read though. I work on the phone and can‚Äôt always listen to something. I would love to be able to take a moment we I am not busy between calls and read a short little bit of information, inspiration or encouragement. Thanks for listening!!
title: Maybe one suggestion‚Ä¶

review: Healing is hard and therapy is hard but good and necessary, between sessions it is been the most amazing app to use for relaxation, focus and sleep! I go to bed with anxiety EVERY night, my husband falls asleep SO fast and I was even more anxious but the nightly meditations have been a miracle! I fall asleep with no anxiety and I don‚Äôt know how it works but it does. I‚Äôm not a person that thought I could get into meditation but this app was so worth the money!
title: Working through heavy anxiety and trauma

review: Amazing app. I‚Äôve struggled with drinking for several years and one of the hardest barriers to stop the abuse was sleep. I‚Äôve always had different vices to help- music, sleep deprivation, movies, etc., but I kept finding myself in the same cycle that ended with alcohol for sleep. Anybody with a similar issue knows the struggle. I truly urge those facing the same problems to give this app a shot. It has been a monumental contribution towards the preservation of my marriage and family.
title: Calm

review: When I first opened the app, I noticed how everything was basically locked. And I wasn‚Äôt really that comfortable with paying 70 dollars a year. Luckily I was able to find a nice meditation session that helped calm myself but I felt like I wanted more. There is too much locked stuff and I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs just for me or many others are experiencing this. I would like to say the meditations are amazing and the voice was so calming. The background music is really nice and isn‚Äôt too annoying. I just wish some more things could be unlocked :)
title: Great App, Not Enough Free.

review: I love calm! Or should I say loved? Calm really helped me get better sleep with the free sleeping music that calm offered, for about 4 or 5 months and everything was going great! Until one night, I opened the app and went to start playing the free music I had saved in my library, and every single song was locked! I don‚Äôt really know why this happened but it‚Äôs really annoying knowing that calm will randomly make you purchase music that has been free for who knows how long ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
title: It was good until‚Ä¶

review:
Calm has a lot of content. Some of it is interesting and unique.  
When it comes to the meditation portions, their voice talent is often amateurish and destructing.   The delivery is stilted, the speakers sometimes pause too long between words and really take away from the calming effect that you would expect in a calming meditation.  They also, for reasons I can‚Äôt understand, have narrators who put the  accent on the wrong syllable in words.   Calm should look at the talent that they have hired.  The content is often useful, but the unprofessional and distracting narration make many of the meditations useless.
title: The app I want to love but annoys in its delivery

review: I used to use this app as a toddler teacher for nap times and now it‚Äôs very overpriced if you want to unlock all features, not even worth downloading unless you want to pay an arm and a leg for all the features. Long time free user here and what was once free is now locked and part of the paid version. App frequently crashes and freezes. The sleep timer doesn‚Äôt work, whatever is playing automatically shuts off after a minute even with a 45 minute timer set; it tells me my time ended. Used to be a great app but now just unfortunately overpriced and not the same.
title: Overpriced and not the same

review: Every day, no matter how hectic, I make the time for a daily calm or a daily trip. Very different approaches that both have allowed me to maintain this daily practice for over four years. Through these difficult times, Calm has been a lifesaver. And when sleep eludes me, a sleep story almost always does the trick. I truly love this app and have purchased a lifetime subscription so I know I will always have it to help me on this journey called life.
title: Calm is my go to app

review: I *very* rarely think it‚Äôs worth my time to write a review but I had to make an exception here. The interface is beautiful, the soundscapes are enchanting. The A-list content (e.g., kids sleep stories such as Trolls story narrated by Anna Kendrick; journey to the stars by LeVar Burton, soundscapes from Dune movie, guided narration by LeBron James, etc) were a welcome surprise. This has helped both me and my kids to calm down and sleep better at night, and I can‚Äôt wait to check out the meditation and breathing practices.
title: Love this

review:
I‚Äôve been a member of this app for almost two years.  I started using it when I was really in a time of need, felt alone, lived across the country from my family, and determined the friends I was hanging out with weren‚Äôt who I wanted to be around or identify as.  

It took a lot of time to find myself again, and I still am and always will be exploring and learning of the world from within.

Thank you calm for your impact. üôèüèº‚ù£Ô∏è
title: Best Self-Care Resource ü•∞

review: For the past few years I have done the daily trip and mr warrens meditations. It has helped me immensely focus and deal with my adhd. I now use the app for soundscapes in my ears to help concentrate on my task at hand. I am not sure why this helps but I wish all people with ADHD knew just noise can calm our brains. I recently started listening to the music as well to calm my mind. Love this app. I only wish they had a sound scape of a singing bowl every 5min to meditate to.
title: Daily trip

review: I purchased calm because I was having difficulty staying asleep. My sleep specialist has told me I have severe insomnia. Listening to  Going back to sleep has helped me to go back to sleep. I do not want to take prescription medication or over-the-counter medication to sleep. I have been using Calm for several months and I do believe my sleep is improving. I also am trying to get into the habit to do the daily meditation.
userName: easy to use. love the barcode
title: Learning to overcome insomnia

review: I love this app so much! It‚Äôs very calming and soothing. However, you do have to pay to get most of the service but I found that I can just favorite all of the free ones and then just have a list of the ones that I can axis. So if u are looking for a meditation app with a variety of free service I would not recommend this one for that reason but, even the ones that you can listen to for free have many different proposes and are great! I totally recommend if you are ok with not a lot of easy axis.
title: Amazing

review: His How to Meditate & The Daily Trip are completely different than traditional approaches to meditation.  He makes it easy, relatable and most importantly, he keeps it real. Everyone can meditate and make it work and make a difference in their own lives.  His meditations are soul food for mental health.I also find the sleep stories helpful when I‚Äôm having trouble getting to sleep.  They work for me.  Completely worth the yearly fee.
title: Jeff Warren is a game changer for meditation

review: The content of this app is beautiful and it‚Äôs great that they have a free trial so you can check it out. However, the celebrity focus is what caused me to not become a member. This will resonate with some people so that‚Äôs fantastic. For me, healthy headspace means setting apart space and time from the noise and that includes media etc. Further, the voice if one of the main narrators/teacher is grating, subjective I know but that‚Äôs why they need choice embedded. If they had options to select the instructor like other apps, that would help a great deal. Still, I couldn‚Äôt stand seeing celebrity mugs pasted across my meditation space.
title: Too celebrity focused

review: I just got this app with the hopes of getting help with self-esteem and sleep but after looking through it, it seems that almost everything has a lock on it, signifying it‚Äôs premium. This honestly rages me considering I can hardly find anything to listen to. It seems as if this app could only be for the select few who can afford to pay for premium. Now, I‚Äôm sure others would disagree with claims that there are free parts of this app but I can‚Äôt find them anywhere.
title: Premium

review: I went from closing the pop up for a good year to trying the ap. I wish I had done it sooner. I am a chef/owner of restaurant in the time of Covid. Sleep and mindfulness went away in March of 2020. In the two short weeks that I have been using Calm I have slept for more than 6 hours each night, and woke feeling rested. I love the meditations, and haven‚Äôt been able to get through one story with out dozing off. Surrender to Calm. You will not regret it.
title: Hooked

review: Honestly, it's an amazing app and I adore it but can't afford to go premium at the moment. When I did have it, the app did wonders for my mental help and I'd eagerly recommend it to everyone. I have 2 favorite stories that would put me right to sleep every night and would love to be able to just have those rather than paying monthly for every available thing.
title: Single purchases?

review:
This program is wonderful. I‚Äôve been plagued with sleep problems my entire life and this program has helped so much. I use it almost daily for its sleep content and have recently started the stress program and meditation exercises. It is such a help with my sleep. 
I now have a life membership and have no regrets. I began with the free program, which gives you enough to sample the program, then moved up to membership.
title: Life changing

review: ITS A AMAZING!!! As a person w/  mental issues this app has really helped me w/ sleeping and calming myself down. This app basically has something for everyone! All ages r good for this app they even have a section just for kids! Filled with kid-friendly things! This app has no adds which is good, because you don‚Äôt want to be in the middle of a calming meditation and then all of the sudden a McDonald‚Äôs add comes on. This app is awesome, I recommend getting it!
title: Awesome u should download

review: Really like the content on this app, and some of their featured daily people. title: Little snippets or longer courses its all here

review: Everything always works out in due time. The ability to trust the process and allow what is happening presently is a medicine most never even get a chance to taste. If we allow the inner voice to be our judge and not just our jury in due time and everything seems to work out like it was supposed to. Trusting the process. Believing in the process. And allowing the process to unfold in it unremarkable timing. #InDueTime
title: In due time‚Ä¶

review:
I do like it and some of the stories put me to sleep. I just wish it would stop asking me questions and asking for ratings. I bought it, isn‚Äôt that enough?

Update:  This app has made my insomnia almost disappear, I am a big believer.  Most nights I‚Äôm asleep halfway through the story.  Funny though one was so interesting I stayed awake to hear it all!
I‚Äôm a big fan of the astronomy and the travel stories.  I seriously recommend the app.
title: Like it

review: I‚Äôve used Calm for about 3 years now, and it has transformed my sleep quality and mental health. I started using in college to help me cope with stress before bed, stretch and relax before plane rides, and breathe through panic attacks. Now, I love drifting off to the familiar sound of Alan Sklar‚Äôs voice or the smooth click of trains on tracks. My students look forward to meditation on Fridays. Thank you to Calm for helping me then and now and I‚Äôm sure for years to come.
title: The Calm in my Chaos

review:
I learned Transcendental Meditation in Collage, but stopped practicing after graduation when life so very busy and there were no TM centers for support. With this app, the environment and support are close as my phone. I feel the peace and tranquility again.
 I wish Calm Management would stop changing the app. After I have meditated and am relaxed and peaceful, I have re-learn how to do something on the app. This causes frustration that dissipates the peace I feel.
title: I feel at peace again

review:
I think calm is a great app to help people sleep. There are many different options so you won‚Äôt get tired of the same old thing. My personal favorites are the sleep stories. I truly believe the premium subscription is worth it. I used to have trouble getting to sleep and would lie awake at night but calm really helped me be able to get a good nights sleep.

As for what I want in addition to the app; I think audiobooks would be nice.

Thx!
title: Love calm

review: I‚Äôve tried many of the meditation apps and Calm is definitely my favorite! Super easy to use and calming interface. They have a great variety of meditations for different moods and settings, which I have found incredibly valuable. I love the ‚ÄúDaily Calm/Trip‚Äù series. Great 10 minute daily meditations with a different focus everyday, I always learn something new! I would definitely recommend this app for anyone interested in meditation.
title: Awesome for Everyone!

review: I used to love this app and have paid for the full subscription for several years now. I do wish new stories were added more frequently but it has been good enough as is.
